title: murugA urutuNai
sahitya:
murugA urutuNai taravE varuvAi tiruvE aghamurai dInadayALanE


anupallavi

  parivODu bhaktarai pAlittE varum karuNAkaranAi kATSi taruvOnE


caraNam    unaiyanri evar enai AtkoNDu aNaiyum tuNaiyAl Adaravu aLippAr
tinai aLavEnum uLaduLam uDanE kanittAl enadu kali tIrndiDumE
